translations: 史前的，有文字记载以前的；<非正式>古老的，过时的

sentences.sentence: We seem to have killed off all our prehistoric competitors.
sentences.translation: 我们似乎把史前的竞争对手都杀光了。

sentences.sentence: Beside this, prehistoric man looks technologically primitive.
sentences.translation: 除此之外，史前人类使用的技术看起来比较简陋。

sentences.sentence: Good morning, ready to continue our review of prehistoric art?
sentences.translation: 早上好，准备好继续我们对史前艺术的回顾之旅了吗？
